Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course

Class Course

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Activity
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Course
All Implemented Interfaces:
Conflict, java.lang.Comparable<Course>
public class Course
extends Activity
implements java.lang.Comparable<Course>
Represents a course that a student would enroll in with WolfScheduler
Author:
Sean McKone

      Constructs a Course object with values for all fields.
      Parameters:
      name - name of Course
      title - title of Course
      section - section of Course
      credits - credit hours for Course
      instructorId - instructor's unity id
      enrollmentCap - enrollmentCap for course
      meetingDays - meeting days for Course as series of chars
      startTime - start time for Course
      endTime - end time for Course
